name: Courtyard by Marriott Richmond Chester

reviews.text: We stayed here as a quick overnight on our way to a convention. It was an easy on/off from 95 South and overall very good. check in was quick, the rooms were ready (with the heat on) and check out was easy, too.
reviews.title: Great room, great stay

reviews.text: We stayed here for one night on our drive home from Florida to Massachusetts. Check in was easy, room was immaculate, nice bathroom and comfy beds. Worked well for us. The only negative I can say is that in the morning they had coffee available which was great, except once we got in the car and took a sip- it was cold. Other than that- nice stay.
reviews.title: Clean rooms, nice hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed for three nights. My traveling companion needed a wheelchair accessible room. The hotel proved to be accessible, but the elevators were a tight squeeze.
reviews.title: Accessible room, ripoff breakfast

likes.disliked: — Breakfast should have been included or the offerings upgraded.

reviews.text: The room was clean and quiet, the bathroom very accessible to a wheelchair user.
reviews.title: Just okay

reviews.text: The breakfast was outrageously expensive considering the quality of what was offered. You would do better finding a local place or going to the Cracker Barrel less than a mile away.
reviews.title: Great Stop Over

aka: Courtyard By Marriott Richmond Chester Hotel
